recipesJson.name: mlNikon's Rainbow Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description:
Bright and Fruity Light rainbow ice cream for this week's Mixin Vixen's Show. Used Jf Blueberry for a nice basey blueberry to balance the brightness of InW Lemons Kick.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bsmG2Wn-3JA&feature=youtu.be

If you Like what we do and want to support us in a fun tasty way, check out our one shots: https://flavorjungle.com/pages/search-results-page?q=mixing+vixens
